scripts.sync-env:
node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const lines=fs.readFileSync('../.env','utf8').split(/?
/); const keys=['HMAC_SECRET','SUPABASE_SERVICE_ROLE_KEY']; const out=lines.filter(l=>keys.some(k=>l.startsWith(k+'='))).join('
')+'
'; fs.writeFileSync('.dev.vars',out); console.log('Synced .dev.vars from ../.env');"
